## allQueensPlaced() function

Determine if all queens of the given color are on the board.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function allQueensPlaced(board: GameBoard, color: Color, config: GameConfig): boolean;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[Color](./hive-lib.color.md)


</td><td>

The color queen to look for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

config


</td><td>

[GameConfig](./hive-lib.gameconfig.md)


</td><td>

The game config.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the number of queens of the given color on the board is equal to the number of queens in the game config, false otherwise.
